channel.title: Instructions on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Instructions on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A. Set up: Create an on-chain crypto wallet Install the extension on your browser Go to https://metamask.io/download/ and Click “Install Metamask for Chromium” Add the wallet extension to the Chrome on Firefox Browser (DO NOT use Safari) Follow guideline to create a wallet Click to the Metamask Icon to use the wallet For those who haven’t had any wallet, please click “Create a new wallet” Enter the password for the wallet Read the instruction of Wallet security and Choose “Secure my wallet” Reveal and copy the seed phrase, the save it at a safe place.

item.title: Starting your journey at Dwarves Discord
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to Dwarves Network, We’ve grown a lot since launching our Discord server since the first day we made this network grow based on developers-centric. That’s why Dwarves Discord is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Discord is where we: Share our software know-how through seminars, discussion channels & tech talks Connect with our friends, alumni, and like-minded people Build an open software network that people love to be a part of.

item.title: How to push content on note.d.foundation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Set up Our note.d.foundation site runs with submodules and is pulled through HTTPS as opposed to SSH, for security and easy onboarding. Clone the repository Clone the repository in the terminal by running this command in the Terminal Run the xcode-select command: xcode-select Install git-credential-manager. For Apple-silicon Macs, download the gcm-osx-arm64-2.4.1.pkg file and run it. Otherwise, select the gcm-osx-x64-2.4.1.pkg package. Then clone the repo: git clone https://github.com/dwarvesf/note.d.foundation.git Open the folder in the Obsidian Install Obsidian from their website: https://obsidian.
